name: Lumber Steve
description:
Lumber Steve is always on the move, go up early and start cutting logs all day long!
The logs are comming and you need to cut them into pieces,
but beware - beavers loves the logs and they sometimes hides along the logs,
cut the logs and not the beavers and you will do just fine!

Now start cutting the logs with Lumber Steve.
Highly addictive game to play and insanely fun for all ages!
